abstract: Wall Street shares were little changed as talks to resolve Greece’s debt crisis went on and analysts pointed to a possible lull after five days of gains.
snippet: Wall Street shares were little changed as talks to resolve Greece’s debt crisis went on and analysts pointed to a possible lull after five days of gains.
lead_paragraph: Stocks were mixed on Tuesday as European finance ministers and Greek bondholders were at a stalemate over how to resolve that nation’s debt crisis.

headline.main: Impasse Over Greece Sends S.&P. Down
headline.print_headline: Impasse Over Greece Sends S.&P. Down
